overview: A cartoon that tells a story of billions of years in 6 minutes and does it differently than you were taught in school. The story that we all heard in childhood and read in textbooks is a story of struggle, where living beings compete with each other for survival, and people win and become the pinnacle of evolution. In the XXI century, this story has brought us to the brink of disaster, and now is the time to tell another story — a story in which we are all connected to each other and are part of the whole.
title: A New History of the Earth
